commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: We're here! Make yourselves at home!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Thank you, Chika! Oh, I love Japanese-style rooms! This really feels like I'm in Japan.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Okay, we dropped off your bags. So now...

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Huh?!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Was that your stomach rumbling, Hanayo?

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Urgh, even though I ate so much for lunch...

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Are you hungry?

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Y-Yeah. Just a little.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: I have mikan oranges and dried fish if you want some. Uchihara's famous for them!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Ooh! Are you sure?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Of course! I was just thinking of showing them to you anyway.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: This mikan orange is so sweet and juicy! I could eat so many of these!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: It must have been grown with plenty of sunlight. It's really delicious!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Hee hee. I'm glad you like it!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: It makes us happy to see you enjoying Uchiura's things, too.

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Th-This is amazing!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Huh?! D-Did something happen?

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: These glossy white grains of rice are as radiant as jewels! Their superb sweetness spreads throughout my mouth!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: The dried fish was plump and packed with flavor! It pairs perfectly with the rice!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: *Sigh* I didn't know rice could taste so delicious!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: I-Is it that good? I guess I never thought about it.

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: This is amazing! I'm moved! The people of Uchiura must be happy every single day!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Happy every day? *Giggle* Thank you! Eat as much as you want, Hanayo!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: It's completely dark now.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: You're right. We weren't able to sightsee much in the end.

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: I-It's because I got so absorbed in eating. I'm sorry.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Don't be. It was worth it since it made you so happy.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Yup! My stomach is full of Uchiura's wonders.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: *Giggle* I'm glad everyone had so much fun. I'm satisfied, too.

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: *Giggle* Chika. Aren't you forgetting something important?

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Remember how we talked about going on a walk? I want to see your school.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Oh, that's right! Let's head out on a night stroll, then!
